func.title: SetAmbientBrightness

param.name: brightness
param.desc: New ambient brightness value. The value should be between 0 and 100, where 0 means no ambient light and 100 means full ambient light.

func.desc: Changes the brightness of the ambient light. In regions with less than 100% ambient light, light sources such as Clonks will generate dynamic light.

example.text: Disables ambient lighting completely, so that everywhere on the map only dynamic light sources make light.
